TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HashAlgorithm extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform
Public MustInherit Class HashAlgorithm Implements ICryptoTransform
type HashAlgorithm = class interface IDisposable interface ICryptoTransform

summary.span: Represents the base class from which all implementations of cryptographic hash algorithms must derive.

span.span: Represents the base class from which all implementations of cryptographic hash algorithms must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 哈希函数是现代加密的基础。Hash functions are fundamental to modern cryptography. 这些函数将任意长度的二进制字符串映射到名为哈希值的固定长度的小型二进制字符串。These functions map binary strings of an arbitrary length to small binary strings of a fixed length, known as hash values. 加密哈希函数具有它为无法以计算方式找到哈希处理为相同的值的两个不同的输入的属性。A cryptographic hash function has the property that it is computationally infeasible to find two distinct inputs that hash to the same value. 哈希函数通常用于使用数字签名以及用于数据完整性。Hash functions are commonly used with digital signatures and for data integrity. 哈希用作表示大量的数据的固定大小的唯一值。The hash is used as a unique value of fixed size representing a large amount of data. 如果还将相应的数据匹配，则应与匹配的两个数据集的哈希值。Hashes of two sets of data should match if the corresponding data also matches. 中大型不可预测的哈希变化的数据结果的小改动。Small changes to the data result in large unpredictable changes in the hash. ## Examples 下面的代码示例计算数组的哈希。The following code example computes the hash for an array. 此示例假定是预定义的字节数组`dataArray[]`。This example assumes that there is a predefined byte array `dataArray[]`. 是的派生的类。 is a derived class of . [!code-cpp[Classic HashAlgorithm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic HashAlgorithm Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HashAlgorithm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic HashAlgorithm Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HashAlgorithm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic HashAlgorithm Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members: and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是对的简单调用方法。This method is a simple call to the method. 调用`Dispose`允许使用的资源类可以重新分配用于其他目的。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the class to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息`Dispose`，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例计算字符串的哈希值并返回该哈希作为 32 个字符的十六进制格式的字符串。The following example computes the hash value of a string and returns the hash as a 32-character, hexadecimal-formatted string. 此代码示例通过创建哈希字符串适用于任何 MD5 哈希函数 （在任何平台） 上创建 32 个字符的十六进制格式哈希字符串。The hash string created by this code example is compatible with any MD5 hash function (on any platform) that creates a 32-character, hexadecimal-formatted hash string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此重载使用哈希算法的实现。By default, this overload uses the implementation of a hash algorithm. 如果你想要指定不同的实现，使用重载，它可让你改为指定算法名称。If you want to specify a different implementation, use the overload, which lets you specify an algorithm name, instead. 加密配置系统定义的默认实现。The cryptography configuration system defines the default implementation of .

summary.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。在重写，请注意不要引用在以前调用之前释放对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅 [实现释放 Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息和，请参阅 [清洗向上非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, routes data written to the object into the hash algorithm for computing the hash.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, routes data written to the object into the hash algorithm for computing the hash.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由应用程序代码不调用此方法。This method is not called by application code. 此抽象方法执行哈希计算。This abstract method performs the hash computation. 每次写入到加密流对象传递数据，通过此方法。Every write to the cryptographic stream object passes the data through this method. 对于每个数据块，此方法更新哈希对象的状态，以便在数据流的末尾，则返回正确的哈希值。For each block of data, this method updates the state of the hash object so a correct hash value is returned at the end of the data stream.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, finalizes the hash computation after the last data is processed by the cryptographic stream object.
The computed hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法完成任何部分计算并返回数据流的正确哈希值。This method finalizes any partial computation and returns the correct hash value for the data stream.

summary.span: Represents the state of the hash computation.

span.span: Represents the state of the hash computation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段用于阻止用户在哈希操作过程中更改的加密哈希算法的密钥。This field is used to prevent users from changing the key of a keyed hash algorithm during a hash operation. 密钥更改合法时，此字段的值将为零之前和之后的哈希操作。When a key change is legitimate, the value of this field is zero both before and after a hash operation. 当密钥的更改不是合法的时则此字段的值不为零。When a key change is not legitimate, the value of this field is nonzero.
